channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How the megabill will limit health care access. And, plans to ease gun regulations
item.description: The House is set to vote on the GOP megabill today. It is set to make big changes that will limit health care access to Americans. And, the ATF plans ...

item.title: Are we in the midst of another mustache renaissance?
item.description: Mustaches are having a moment. Here's what it's like living with one.

item.title: Sean Combs found guilty on two counts, but acquitted on most serious charges
item.description: Combs was found guilty of two counts of transportation to engage in prostitution, but the jury found him not guilty on the more serious charges of rac...

item.title: Wisconsin's 1849 law does not ban abortion, the state Supreme Court rules
item.description: After years of litigation following the Dobbs decision, the Wisconsin Supreme Court justices, with their liberal majority, ruled that the state's 176-...

item.title: Greetings from Alishan, Taiwan, whose red cypress forests offer timeless beauty
item.description: Far-Flung Postcards is a weekly series in which NPR's international team shares snapshots of moments from their lives and work around the world.

item.title: New expedition will seek to locate Amelia Earhart's lost plane
item.description: An expedition to a remote and tiny island this fall will attempt to locate Amelia Earhart's planeâ€‹ in the Pacific Ocean.

item.title: Ukraine fears increased Russian aggression after US halt of weapons supply
item.description: On Tuesday the White House said that it had cut off some weapons deliveries to Ukraine in order "to put America's interests first".

item.title: Sean "Diddy" Combs acquitted of sex trafficking, convicted on lesser charges
item.description: The verdict in the Sean "Diddy" Combs trial comes after the high-profile proceedings started in May.

item.title: Video shows airborne shark hitting surfer's face in Florida
item.description: Surfer Darren Kaye said he noticed the spinner shark before the collision, but thought nothing of it until the animal came flying at him.

item.title: Bryan Kohberger is due to appear in court to plead guilty in University of Idaho stabbings
Ugandan military helicopter crashes and catches fire in Somalia
item.description: Three people on board escaped with burns, but five others are "yet to be accounted for", an official say.

item.title: Jihadist fighters stage series of attacks on Mali military posts
item.description: Tuesday's attack marks the third major assault on army positions over the past month.

item.title: Microsoft to lay off 4% of workforce in latest round of job cuts
item.description: The tech company is laying off roughly 9,000 workers in latest round of job cuts, after slashing 6,000 jobs in May.

item.title: A day outside an LA detention center shows profound impact of ICE raids on families
Dalai Lama confirms he will have a successor after his death
item.description: The exiled leader of Tibetan Buddhism issues a landmark announcement as he turns 90, ending years of uncertainty.

item.title: Trump says Israel has agreed to conditions for 60-day Gaza ceasefire
item.description: A Hamas official told the BBC the group is "ready and serious" to reach an agreement if it ends the war.

item.title: Lululemon sues Costco, alleging the discount retailer copied its designs
item.description: Lululemon is accusing Costco of stealing from its "path-breaking" brand by selling dupes of its sweatshirts, jackets and pants.

item.title: In Idaho college town where 4 students were killed, relief and anger over Bryan Kohberger plea deal
item.description: Residents are expressing a mix of relief and anger in the small Idaho college town where four students were stabbed to death after the news that the m...
